sentences.en: It was not our place to overthrow a dictator ; it was yours if you so choose.
sentences.cn: 我们的领导说谎了,他们说伊拉克具有大规模杀伤性武器.

sentences.en: Our boss is a bit of a dictator.
The dictator and his cronies had milked their country of somewhere between $ 5 billion and $ 10 billion ( Russell Watson )
sentences.cn: 独裁者及他的亲信从他们的国家榨取大约50亿到100亿美元 ( 拉塞尔沃森 )

sentences.en: The dictator's third and youngest son, is thought to be the favoured candidate as successor.
sentences.cn: 他的第三个也是随年幼的儿子金正云被认为是最可能的继任者.

sentences.en: the downfall of the hated dictator
sentences.cn: 遭人痛恨的独裁者的垮台

sentences.en: They set the general up as a dictator.
sentences.cn: 他们赋与将军指挥者的权力.

words.tran_cn: 独裁的，专政的；专横傲慢的
专政；独裁权；独裁者职位

trans.tran_en: a ruler who has complete power over a country, especially one whose power has been gained by force
